   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(mnesia2_nice_coverage_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: -compile([export_all]).
   25: -include("mnesia2_test_lib.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -record(nice_tab, {key, val}).
   28: 
   29: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   30:     mnesia2_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   31: 
   32: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   33:     mnesia2_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   34: 
   35: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   36: all() -> 
   37:     [nice].
   38: 
   39: groups() -> 
   40:     [].
   41: 
   42: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   43:     Config.
   44: 
   45: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: 
   49: nice(doc) -> [""];
   50: nice(suite) -> [];
   51: nice(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   52:     %% The whole test suite is one huge test case for the time beeing
   53:     
   54:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config), 
   55:     Attrs = record_info(fields, nice_tab), 
   56:     
   57:     initialize(Attrs, Node1), 
   58:     dirty_access(Node1), 
   59:     success_and_fail(), 
   60:     index_mgt(), 
   61:     
   62:     adm(Attrs, Node1, Node2), 
   63:     snmp(Node1, Node2), 
   64:     backup(Node1), 
   65:     ?verify_mnesia2(Nodes, []).
   66: 
   67: initialize(Attrs, Node1) ->
   68:     ?match(Version when is_list(Version), mnesia2:system_info(version)), 
   69: 
   70:     Schema = [{name, nice_tab}, 
   71: 	      {attributes, Attrs}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}], 
   72: 
   73:     ?match({_, _}, mnesia2:system_info(schema_version)), 
   74:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(Schema)), 
   75: 
   76:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:info()), 
   77:     ?match(set, mnesia2:table_info(nice_tab, type)), 
   78:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:schema()), 
   79:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:schema(nice_tab)),
   80:     ok.
   81: 
   82: dirty_access(Node1) ->
   83:     TwoThree = #nice_tab{key=23, val=23}, 
   84:     TwoFive  = #nice_tab{key=25, val=25}, 
   85:     ?match([], mnesia2:dirty_slot(nice_tab, 0)), 
   86:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write(TwoThree)), 
   87:     ?match([TwoThree], mnesia2:dirty_read({nice_tab, 23})), 
   88:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write(TwoFive)), 
   89:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_delete_object(TwoFive)), 
   90: 
   91:     ?match(23, mnesia2:dirty_first(nice_tab)), 
   92:     ?match('$end_of_table', mnesia2:dirty_next(nice_tab, 23)), 
   93:     ?match([TwoThree], mnesia2:dirty_match_object(TwoThree)), 
   94:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_delete({nice_tab, 23})), 
   95: 
   96:     CounterSchema = [{ram_copies, [Node1]}], 
   97:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(nice_counter_tab, CounterSchema)), 
   98:     TwoFour  = {nice_counter_tab, 24, 24}, 
   99:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write(TwoFour)), 
  100:     ?match(34, mnesia2:dirty_update_counter({nice_counter_tab, 24}, 10)), 
  101:     TF = {nice_counter_tab, 24, 34}, 
  102:     ?match([TF], mnesia2:dirty_read({nice_counter_tab, 24})), 
  103:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_delete({nice_counter_tab, 24})), 
  104:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_delete_object(TF)),
  105:     ok.
  106: 
  107: success_and_fail() ->
  108:     ?match({atomic, a_good_trans}, mnesia2:transaction(fun() ->good_trans()end)), 
  109: 
  110:     BadFun =
  111: 	fun() ->
  112: 		Two = #nice_tab{key=2, val=12}, 
  113: 		?match([Two], mnesia2:match_object(#nice_tab{key='$1', val=12})), 
  114: 		?match([#nice_tab{key=3, val=13}], mnesia2:wread({nice_tab, 3})), 
  115: 		?match(ok, mnesia2:delete({nice_tab, 1})), 
  116: 		?match(ok, mnesia2:delete_object(Two)), 
  117: 		mnesia2:abort(bad_trans), 
  118: 		?match(bad, trans)
  119: 	end, 
  120:     ?match({aborted, bad_trans}, mnesia2:transaction(BadFun)), 
  121:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia2:error_description(no_exists)), 
  122:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:transaction(fun(A) -> lock(), A end, [ok])), 
  123:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:transaction(fun(A) -> lock(), A end, [ok], 3)),
  124:     ok.
  125: 
  126: good_trans() ->
  127:     ?match([], mnesia2:read(nice_tab, 3)), 
  128:     ?match([], mnesia2:read({nice_tab, 3})), 
  129:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:write(#nice_tab{key=14, val=4})), 
  130:     ?match([14], mnesia2:all_keys(nice_tab)), 
  131: 
  132:     Records = [ #nice_tab{key=K, val=K+10} || K <- lists:seq(1, 10) ], 
  133:     Ok = [ ok || _ <- Records], 
  134:     ?match(Ok, lists:map(fun(R) -> mnesia2:write(R) end, Records)), 
  135:     a_good_trans.
  136: 
  137: 
  138: lock() ->
  139:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:s_write(#nice_tab{key=22, val=22})), 
  140:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:read_lock_table(nice_tab)), 
  141:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:write_lock_table(nice_tab)),
  142:     ok.
  143: 
  144: index_mgt() ->
  145:     UniversalRec = #nice_tab{key=4711, val=4711}, 
  146:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dirty_write(UniversalRec)), 
  147:     ValPos = #nice_tab.val, 
  148:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:add_table_index(nice_tab, ValPos)), 
  149: 
  150:     IndexFun =
  151: 	fun() ->
  152: 		?match([UniversalRec], 
  153: 		       mnesia2:index_read(nice_tab, 4711, ValPos)), 
  154: 		Pat = #nice_tab{key='$1', val=4711}, 
  155: 		?match([UniversalRec], 
  156: 		       mnesia2:index_match_object(Pat, ValPos)), 
  157: 		index_trans
  158: 	end, 
  159:     ?match({atomic, index_trans}, mnesia2:transaction(IndexFun, infinity)), 
  160:     ?match([UniversalRec], 
  161: 	   mnesia2:dirty_index_read(nice_tab, 4711, ValPos)), 
  162:     ?match([UniversalRec], 
  163: 	   mnesia2:dirty_index_match_object(#nice_tab{key='$1', val=4711}, ValPos)), 
  164: 
  165:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:del_table_index(nice_tab, ValPos)),
  166:     ok.
  167: 
  168: adm(Attrs, Node1, Node2) ->
  169:     This = node(), 
  170:     ?match({ok, This}, mnesia2:subscribe(system)), 
  171:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
  172: 	   mnesia2:add_table_copy(nice_tab, Node2, disc_only_copies)), 
  173:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
  174: 	   mnesia2:change_table_copy_type(nice_tab, Node2, ram_copies)), 
  175:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:del_table_copy(nice_tab, Node1)), 
  176:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia2, stop, [])), 
  177:     ?match([], mnesia2_test_lib:start_mnesia2([Node1, Node2], [nice_tab])), 
  178:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:wait_for_tables([schema], infinity)), 
  179: 
  180:     Transformer = fun(Rec) ->
  181: 			  list_to_tuple(tuple_to_list(Rec) ++ [initial_value])
  182: 		  end, 
  183:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
  184: 	   mnesia2:transform_table(nice_tab, Transformer, Attrs ++ [extra])), 
  185: 
  186:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:delete_table(nice_tab)), 
  187:     DumpSchema = [{name, nice_tab}, {attributes, Attrs}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}], 
  188:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(DumpSchema)), 
  189:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:dump_tables([nice_tab])), 
  190:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:move_table_copy(nice_tab, Node2, Node1)), 
  191: 
  192:     ?match(yes, mnesia2:force_load_table(nice_counter_tab)), 
  193:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:sync_log()),
  194:     ?match(dumped, mnesia2:dump_log()),
  195:     ok.
  196: 
  197: backup(Node1) ->
  198:     Tab = backup_nice,
  199:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1]}], 
  200:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(Tab, Def)),    
  201:     ?match({ok,_,_}, mnesia2:activate_checkpoint([{name, cp}, {max, [Tab]}])), 
  202:     File = "nice_backup.BUP",
  203:     File2 = "nice_backup2.BUP",
  204:     File3 = "nice_backup3.BUP",
  205:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:backup_checkpoint(cp, File)), 
  206:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:backup_checkpoint(cp, File, mnesia2_backup)), 
  207:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:deactivate_checkpoint(cp)), 
  208:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:backup(File)), 
  209:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:backup(File, mnesia2_backup)), 
  210: 
  211:     Fun = fun(X, Acc) -> {[X], Acc} end,
  212:     ?match({ok, 0}, mnesia2:traverse_backup(File, File2, Fun, 0)), 
  213:     ?match({ok, 0}, mnesia2:traverse_backup(File, mnesia2_backup, dummy, read_only, Fun, 0)), 
  214:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:install_fallback(File)), 
  215:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:uninstall_fallback()), 
  216:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:install_fallback(File, mnesia2_backup)), 
  217:     ?match(ok, mnesia2:dump_to_textfile(File3)), 
  218:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:load_textfile(File3)),
  219:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
  220:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File2)),
  221:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File3)),
  222:     ok.
  223: 
  224: snmp(Node1, Node2) ->
  225:     Tab = nice_snmp, 
  226:     Def = [{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}], 
  227:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:create_table(Tab, Def)),
  228:     ?match({aborted, {badarg, Tab, _}}, mnesia2:snmp_open_table(Tab, [])),
  229:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:snmp_open_table(Tab, [{key, integer}])),
  230:     ?match(endOfTable, mnesia2:snmp_get_next_index(Tab, [0])), 
  231:     ?match(undefined, mnesia2:snmp_get_row(Tab, [0])), 
  232:     ?match(undefined, mnesia2:snmp_get_mnesia2_key(Tab, [0])), 
  233:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia2:snmp_close_table(Tab)),
  234:     ok.
  235:
